author: Time
title: Escalator in Hong Kong Mall Suddenly Reverses, Injuring 18
text: Escalator in Hong Kong Mall Suddenly Reverses, Injuring 18 At least 18 shoppers at a Hong Kong mall were injured on Saturday when a escalator suddenly reversed at an increased speed Post to Facebook Escalator in Hong Kong Mall Suddenly Reverses, Injuring 18 At least 18 shoppers at a Hong Kong mall were injured on Saturday when a escalator suddenly reversed at an increased speed  //usat.ly/2okveCL   Join the Nation's Conversation   Escalator in Hong Kong Mall Suddenly Reverses, Injuring 18 CLOSE
